detaileddescription.para: Return whether a particular setting in <datadir>/settings.json is or would be ignored because it is also specified in the command line.

briefdescription.para: Return setting value from <datadir>/settings.json or bitcoin.conf.

detaileddescription.para: Force a setting value to be applied, overriding any other configuration source, but not being persisted.
Clear all settings in <datadir>/settings.json and store a backup of previous settings in <datadir>/settings.json.bak.
